item.title: Far too many leaves built up, 1st December
item.description:
Massive buildup of dead leaves - seemingly no clearing this autumn. Deep banks of dead leaves particularly near church. Will gradually rot in wet weather and block drains, causing flooding
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Vassall Road, Oval, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Man hole cover sticking out the floor, 1st December
item.description:
Sticking up of the floor my elderly dad tripped over it last week and broke his toe, now my grandson who is 4 has cut all his knee! Needs sorting out asap because unlike me who only care that my family are ok, you are going to get someone hurt there selfâ€™s and take the council to court is so dangerous. Been like this for a few months at least

item.title: One of four dead trees has fallen today, 1st December
